title: (x) The Montana inline serif face - Colonna {Akira}
content:
I KNOW the name, I just can’t remember it. It’s the one our architect used. Please put me out of my misery!

Best wishes and sincere apologies: I know this is a widely-used font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080504010644im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_3811.jpg)

 [‹ Corona Extra logo blackletter](http://web.archive.org/web/20080504010644/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36015 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Infosys logo and headlines - Univers UltraCond, (similar to) Optima {Akira, Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080504010644/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35748 "Go to next forum topic")
author: swroot

comments.content:
Thank you very, very much. I hope your next difficulty is solved so easily!

sarah

This exact same sample was identified [just the day before your request](http://web.archive.org/web/20080504010644/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35734). Maybe next time first do a [Search](http://web.archive.org/web/20080504010644/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20montana%20colonna). ;^)
